name: Pack Check
description:
It's your first day working at the airport security. You need to check if passengers have any dangerous items on them.

If anybody dies it WILL be your fault. tread carefully.

There are three possible endings. There's also a little easter egg on your desk (don't tell anybody).

The game can be played using only the mouse

Made for the Quarantine Game Jam
Developer: Simon de Bruijne
https://smos-bois.itch.io/

Artist: Valery  Huisman
https://slootkoet.itch.io/
